address.docs:
**, int**: The I²C address of the Multiplexer. Defaults to `0x70`.

*See also: [TCA9548A I²C Multiplexer](https://esphome.io/components/tca9548a.html#configuration-variables)*

channels.docs:
The I²C Bus Channels
  * **bus_id** (**Required**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): The id to use for this virtual I2C Bus.
  
  * **channel** (**Required**): The channel (0-7) to use for this virtual I2C Bus.
  
  

*See also: [TCA9548A I²C Multiplexer](https://esphome.io/components/tca9548a.html#configuration-variables)*

bus_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this virtual I2C Bus.

*See also: [TCA9548A I²C Multiplexer](https://esphome.io/components/tca9548a.html#configuration-variables)*

channel.docs:
The channel (0-7) to use for this virtual I2C Bus.

*See also: [TCA9548A I²C Multiplexer](https://esphome.io/components/tca9548a.html#configuration-variables)*

i2c_id.docs:
The I²C Bus ID Defaults to `false`

*See also: [TCA9548A I²C Multiplexer](https://esphome.io/components/tca9548a.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this TCA9548A component.

*See also: [TCA9548A I²C Multiplexer](https://esphome.io/components/tca9548a.html#configuration-variables)*
